title: 458: Bible Broads Finale
itunes:title: 458: Bible Broads Finale
description:
Today The Broads reminisce about their past “Bible Broads” episodes and discuss where they are at now, what they believe, religious trauma, navigating certain relationships post religion, teaching their children, and much more. Grateful for all the #broadsquad.

***Tune in Thursday for the BIP recap and news about Chatty Broads for the upcoming weeks

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***ARTICLE: Get $50 off your first purchase of $100 or more at ARTICLE.COM/CHATTY 

***DAILY HARVEST: Go to DAILYHARVEST.COM/CHATTY to get up to $40 off your first box! 

***HONEYLOVE: Get 20% off @honeylove with the code CHATTYBROADS at Honeylove.com/CHATTYBROADS
